duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead pursuit in assigned territory, prospect, qualify, negotiate and close opportunities for storage products and solutions.
Collaborate with Account Generalists to provide storage expertise within the sales team.
Develop pursuit plans, build and manage the storage sales pipeline, and contribute to proposal development, negotiations and deal closings.
Coordinate supporting sales activities related to pipeline hygiene through account managers, Presales, channel partners, and other stakeholders.
Collaborate across HPE teams to deliver a consistent approach to developing business, including account planning for end-to-end solutions.
Assess solution feasibility from a technical and business perspective to qualify/disqualify opportunities and negotiate profitable deals.
Drive sales of the Storage portfolio, forge relationships with the channel, and provide enablement of key technologies.
Coordinate Storage marketing campaigns, act as a trusted storage solutions consultant, and reinforce HPE's strategy and portfolio to partners and champions.
Use references to craft a story that makes complex technologies simple and understandable for customers, actively generate customer interest, and understand customer's buying trends.

education_certification.credential: University or Bachelor's degree preferred. 5+ years of sales experience. Storage related sales experience required.
